node.doctext:
Level 13: Curate

Curates are just Curates.

About the only thing special about them is that for hysterical raisins they get to go on the [id://3559] list. (See [id://506005].)

Of course, Level 13 monks also get more votes than Level 12 monks. See the [id://5938] for details.

Back to [PerlMonks FAQ]
node.title: Level 13: Curate
